What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Card reads as follows:

Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

neither in my nor in his combat phase the opponent is promted, that he may sacrifice a creature. Actually it's my upkeep step, and only mine, when he is prompted. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
